name: Mechanical Mainframe
description:
The goddess' data is fading; decaying as time goes on and leaves old hardware to die. Wander the cavern to save the last of her files by poking and fiddling with pieces of dying technology. Let her wisdom guide you as you solve this puzzling quest.

Get this game along with other Michigan Made Indie Games in this Locally Sourced Winter Bundle!

Note: This game is at a higher price for the duration of the bundle. So go buy the bundle!
https://itch.io/b/786/locally-sourced-winter-bundle
